Terminology
=======

Ansible Terms
------
 - Adhoc
 - Modules
 - Inventory
 - Play and Playbook
 - Roles
 - Jinja2 Templates
 - Ansible Vault
 - Ansible-Galaxy
 - Debugging (verbosity)


Additional Terms
-------
 - Git
 - Linting (yamllint)
 - CI/CD
 - Pipeline

 .. confval:: prev_next_buttons_location

    :type: string
    :default: ``bottom``
